sentence.Network_en: Nobody told y'all light - skinned dudes ain't in style no more?
sentence.Network_cn: 没人告诉你们已经不流行浅肤色了 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: Famous black men often pick light - skinned or white wives.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些有名的黑人经常挑选浅肤色或白人女性作太太.

sentence.Network_en: One of these is skin cancer, especially basal and squamous cell carcinomas, among light - skinned peoples.
sentence.Network_cn: 在肤色淡的族群中,皮肤癌是一个例子, 特别是基底细胞癌与鳞状上皮细胞癌.
